title: Competency-Based Mathematics Simulation Curriculum: Enhancing Practical Skills Through VR Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and comprehension of simple mathematical formulas
context.additional_context: A customized training program focused on improving mathematical thinking applicable to real-world business problems.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical concepts to real-world work scenarios through VR simulations.
Learners can decompose complex problems into hierarchical competency elements (analysis→modeling→verification) to solve them.
Learners can demonstrate mathematical collaborative problem-solving competencies through team project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
